title: Making your case
brief_description:
Credits: Directed by Peter Robinson written by Antony Jay;”Cast: Susie Blake, Ian Lavender, Joe Melia, Joan Sanderson, Thorley Walters”;
“SUMMARY: Deals with the art and skill of making an effective oral presentation. Covers preparation, structure or plan
